committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, U.S. Postal Service, and Labor Policy

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Government should incorporate the principles of the Lean Six Sigma management strategy.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the federal government should incorporate the principles of the Lean Six Sigma management strategy to reduce government spending, eliminate waste, and provide more efficient usage of taxpayer money and improved service to the taxpayer.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Government should incorporate the principles of the Lean Six Sigma management strategy.
